kDesc
You and your Deep Ocean RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Grâce au lien fort qui s'est créé entre votre truck RC océanique et vous, il vous suivra partout dans PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Du hast eine starke Bindung zu deinem "Tiefsee"-RC-Truck aufgebaut. Er folgt dir in PlayStation®Home überallhin! [#Legal]
Tu e il tuo Camion RC Oceano profondo avete stretto un forte legame e da adesso ti seguirà per tutto PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
¡Tu camión de control remoto de océano profundo y tú habéis desarrollado un fuerte vínculo y te seguirá por todo PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
*Not Localised* You and your Deep Ocean RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
딥 오션 RC 트럭이 당신과 깊은 유대 관계를 형성했습니다. 이제 PlayStation®Home 어디든 당신을 따라 다닐 겁니다! [#Legal]
You and your Deep Ocean RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
你和你的深海RC大貨車已經建立了深厚的感情。無論在PlayStation®Home的任何地方，它也會跟隨你！ [#Legal]
